thread.title: Tom Segura bringing comedy tour to Buffalo: Where to buy tickets - syracuse.com
thread.title_full: Tom Segura bringing comedy tour to Buffalo: Where to buy tickets - syracuse.com

author: Madison Kemeny
title: Tom Segura bringing comedy tour to Buffalo: Where to buy tickets - syracuse.com
text: Comedian Tom Segura is bringing his [“Come Together Tour”](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587360&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vividseats.com%2Ftom-segura-tickets--theater-comedy%2Fperformer%2F36221) to the KeyBank Center in Buffalo, NY, on Friday, September 27. The show starts at 8 p.m. and is part of the second leg of his global stand-up tour following the phenomenal success of his last tour, “I’m Coming Everywhere.” Segura’s “Come Together Tour” is set to showcase his latest hour of comedy, delivering fresh material that draws from personal experiences and blends observational humor with his trademark storytelling style. Where to buy Tom Segura tickets Tickets can be purchased online through [Ticketmaster](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587360&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ticketmaster.com%2Fevent%2F00006073B5B92C51) and secondary market platforms such as [Vivid Seats](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587360&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vividseats.com%2Ftom-segura-tickets-buffalo-keybank-center-9-27-2024--theater-comedy%2Fproduction%2F4891451), [SeatGeek](https://seatgeek.pxf.io/c/1810056/1753574/20501?u=https%3A%2F%2Fseatgeek.com%2Ftom-segura-tickets%2Fcomedy%2F2024-09-27-8-pm%2F6450320) and [StubHub](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587360&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.stubhub.com%2Ftom-segura-buffalo-tickets-9-27-2024%2Fevent%2F153313619%2F), which offer verified tickets with a buyer’s guarantee. Here’s a look at the best prices available (including fees): [Vivid Seats](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587360&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vividseats.com%2Ftom-segura-tickets-buffalo-keybank-center-9-27-2024--theater-comedy%2Fproduction%2F4891451): Starting at $24.63 [SeatGeek](https://seatgeek.pxf.io/c/1810056/1753574/20501?u=https%3A%2F%2Fseatgeek.com%2Ftom-segura-tickets%2Fcomedy%2F2024-09-27-8-pm%2F6450320): Starting at $32 [StubHub](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587360&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.stubhub.com%2Ftom-segura-buffalo-tickets-9-27-2024%2Fevent%2F153313619%2F): Starting at $26 [Ticketmaster](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587360&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ticketmaster.com%2Fevent%2F00006073B5B92C51): Starting at $37.80 Prices and availability are noted at the time of publishing and are subject to change. A complete list of Segura’s tour dates is available [here](https://go.skimresources.com?id=126006X1587360&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vividseats.com%2Ftom-segura-tickets--theater-comedy%2Fperformer%2F36221). Segura is best known for his stand-up comedy specials “Sledgehammer,” “Ball Hog,” “Disgraceful” and “Completely Normal,” among others. In addition to stand-up comedy, Segura co-hosts popular podcasts like “Your Mom’s House,” which he runs with his wife, comedian Christina Pazsitzky, and “2 Bears, 1 Cave,” alongside fellow comedian Bert Kreischer. He’s also made appearances in several films and television shows, including “Instant Family” and “The Late Show with Stephen Colbert.” More [concert tickets](https://www.syracuse.com/topic/concert tickets) [Stevie Wonder 'Sing Your Song!' tour coming to NYC for election season](https://www.syracuse.com/live-entertainment/2024/09/stevie-wonder-sing-your-song-tour-coming-to-nyc-for-election-season.html) [Teddy Swims performing in Upstate NY: When, where, tickets](https://www.syracuse.com/live-entertainment/2024/09/teddy-swims-performing-in-upstate-ny-when-where-tickets.html) [Jelly Roll to perform sold-out show in Albany: How to get tickets](https://www.syracuse.com/live-entertainment/2024/09/jelly-roll-to-perform-sold-out-show-in-albany-how-to-get-tickets.html) [Rock & Roll Hall of Fame inductee going on fall tour, includes two NYC shows](https://www.syracuse.com/live-entertainment/2024/09/rock-roll-hall-of-fame-inductee-going-on-fall-tour-includes-two-nyc-shows.html) [Zayn Malik's first solo tour 'Stairway to the Sky' includes NYC show](https://www.syracuse.com/live-entertainment/2024/09/zayn-maliks-first-solo-tour-stairway-to-the-sky-includes-nyc-show.html)
